item.title: a soft start
item.description:
this is where the whisper goes.

a pause.

a breath before anything breaks.

item.title: Calm & Clear Job Search Dashboard
item.description: A Notion dashboard template to track applications, stay grounded, and protect your energy during the job search. Includes self-care check-ins, scam awareness tips, and a printable weekly reflection worksheet.

item.title: Calm & Clear Job Search Toolkit
item.description: A Notion-based job search toolkit with email templates, resume tips, and tone guidance to help you get replies â€” without the burnout. Built to sound like you.

item.title: Calm in the Chaos
item.description: A single-page printable for grounding yourself when everything feels too loud. Includes calming prompts, a gentle breathing pattern, and simple reset checklists.
